title: Agora at Malia
description: The so-called "agora" is a large open courtyard to the northwest of the Middle Minoan palace at Malia.

properties.description: Location of the center of the so-called "agora" north of the Minoan palace at Malia, based on Google Earth imagery and plan on p. 260 of Poursat 2010.
properties.title: Imagery location of "Agora" at Malia
